ygData.subject: Re: A Chance For The Ark???
ygData.msgSnippet: (I hate to tell you this, but the Alliance is trying to leave, and Hakibuscon attacking them has complicated things, and now the Ark will be shot at even more

(I hate to tell you this, but the Alliance is trying to leave, and 
Hakibuscon attacking them has complicated things, and now the Ark 
will be shot at even more since the Alliance isn't going to backdown 
with out all its men :)



Oblitertron/Punch/Zergling/Oinker/Unitron/BH/Blastrage:



Zergling slammed into a wall, surprised by the blasts.

---

Punch fired off three bolts from his pistol at Hakibuscon's chest.

-----

Oinker ran inside the Ark.  "Slaggun Maxis..."

---

Unitron fired off six bolts at the Ark (three from each weapon), a 
little bored.  He may just ditch the Alliance and go for Hell Beast's 
Predacons.

---

Oblitertron turned away from the Terrorccons, firng off two optic 
blasts at the hull of the Ark.

---

Blastrag efired off another three grenades from the mounted grenade 
launcher at the Ark, BH slowly moving the skimmer away from the 
battle.
